title: THANKSGIVING / Tarantino
content:
hi typophiles,

check this out:  
 [http://www.cinematical.com/2009/07/09/exclusive-eli-roth-talks-thanksgiv...](http://web.archive.org/web/20090722133522/http:/www.cinematical.com/2009/07/09/exclusive-eli-roth-talks-thanksgiving/ "http://www.cinematical.com/2009/07/09/exclusive-eli-roth-talks-thanksgiving/")

great, or what?! ;) can you name the font they used in that trailer?

[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VU5LkAB3zXw](http://web.archive.org/web/20090722133522/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=VU5LkAB3zXw "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VU5LkAB3zXw")

the font for “THANKSGIVING”

the “I” “G” and “N” should tell me it’s custom. But what if it isn’t?

;) “thanksgiving” ...

thank you very much! love you all ;)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090722133522im_/http:/typophile.com/files/thanks1_3461.jpg)
author: flabrea
